name: Josef and the Toy Fair
description:
A submission for the NaNoRenO 2018

v0.2 is still incomplete, with almost exclusively proto art and only 3 scenes out of the 7 planned. If you can bear programmer art, though, go ahead and play it!

A session lasts around 3'30. Feedback is welcome, although I don't need if I will have time to go further, especially with graphics since I would need collaborators.

The source code is available at https://github.com/hsandt/toy-fair
